key_risk_themes: ["Security Implementation Complexity","CI/CD Pipeline & DevOps Overhead","Asynchronous System Reliability"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Allocate dedicated DevOps resources to stabilize and document the CI/CD pipeline (RISK-002).","Conduct a formal security design review for the JWT session management and permanent deletion SAGA patterns (RISK-001, RISK-003).","Ensure the AWS ElastiCache for Redis is configured with Multi-AZ replication (RISK-006)."]
